main event: An unidentified flying object was reported over Fort Walton Beach, Florida on 21 July 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as circular with a bright yellow center and a light yellow haze., The size of the object was estimated between a softball and a basketball., The sighting duration was approximately 5-7 minutes., The observations were made by civilians who appeared sincere and confident in their accounts., No other confirming reports were obtained, and no aircraft were in the area during the sighting.
witness description: civilians in the area who showed sincerity in their observations
